nodes.bodyText: Why is this necessary? Isn't the Fragment the LifecycleOwner?
This is needed because of the updated lifecycle library: 2.1.0 --> 2.2.0
Let's revert this and handle it separately
I'm fine slotting it in, was just wondering why it was needed.

FYI, that wasn't breaking the build task, but the lint check.
https://stackoverflow.com/a/58912855
I see, this is very helpful, thank you!
